name: MK 2048
description:
MK 2048 is a simple, fun, and addictive number puzzle game. Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile , The game's objective is to slide numbered tiles on a grid to combine them to create a tile with the number 2048. However, one can continue to play the game after reaching the goal, creating tiles with larger numbers.

FEATURES:

-Game is automatically autosaved

-Unlimited Undo mode

-Leaderboards & Achievements

-Beautiful and simple UI

-Keep playing for High-score after collected 2048 tile

HOW TO PLAY:

-Swipe (Up, Down, Left or Right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one. When 2048 tile is created, the player wins! 8 .. 16 .. 128 .. 1024 .. 2048.
